meanings.definition: The part of the throat behind the mouth and nasal cavity.
meanings.sent1: When you swallow, food passes through the pharynges.
meanings.sent2: Doctors examine the pharynges to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The pharynges decided to throw a party for the tonsils.
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed through the pharynges of the empty auditorium.
meanings.sent5: The pharynges, like a gateway, lead to the digestive system.
